column4: I was wondering why with the sysinfo utility my 2.20ghz dual core processor is being  reported 2x 1650 mhz, is this normal, i tried intel and the won't help me
ok thanks, i thought i got ripped off
dual core means two processors in one package
it could be that speedstep is in use
speedstep lowers CPU speed when idle
are you on windows or linux
that will tell you the model name and its real MHz
my c2d runs at 600MHz at idle and steps up to 2.66GHz when needed
model name is the way to know what its maximum speed is
then that is the correct speed, speedstep is active
do something processor intensive and you should see MHz go up to 2.2
